name: CATS HARVEST
description:
Collect fruits to keep your farm running and protect it from intrusive animals

  • Rules: The factory has life points that decrease over time or if it is attacked by parasitic animals, you have to protect the factory by collecting fruits and rooting the factory to keep it active. If the factory’s life points reach zero, you lose. If your life points reach zero, you also lose.  Factory life and activity points until the time expires, you can kill hostile animals and get abhorrent features such as life points, speed or time.  Bush and tap on it to collect, to attack monsters you have to get close and tap on monsters , You can enjoy changing weather and 24 hour mode.
